title: Selectors
imports: import { Individual } from '/ga/individual'; import { Population } from '/ga/population';

functions.code: const competitors: Individual[] = _.sampleSize(population.individuals, 4); const winner = competitors.reduce((currentWinner, competitor) => competitor.fitness >= currentWinner.fitness ? competitor : currentWinner); return winner;
const index: number = Math.floor(Math.random() * population.size); return population.individuals[index];
